text: Britney Spears has won this award three times, the most by any artist. The following is a list of Teen Choice Award winners and nominees for Choice Music - Female Artist. Britney Spears, Kelly Clarkson, and Taylor Swift are the most awarded artists in this category with three wins each. Miley Cyrus is the youngest winner in 2008 at the age of 15. Fergie is the oldest winner in 2007 at the age of 32. ==Winners and nominees== ===1999=== {|class="wikitable" width=70% !Year !Winner !Nominees !Ref. |- |align="center"|1999 |Brandy | *Christina Aguilera *Mariah Carey *Faith Evans *Lauryn Hill *Monica *Britney Spears *Shania Twain |align="center"| |} ===2000s=== {|class="wikitable" width=70% !Year !Winner !Nominees !Ref. |- |align="center"|2000 | Britney Spears | *Christina Aguilera *Mariah Carey *Missy Elliott *Macy Gray *Jennifer Lopez *Mandy Moore *Jessica Simpson |align="center"| |- |align="center"|2001 |Britney Spears | *Aaliyah *Christina Aguilera *Dido *Janet Jackson *Jennifer Lopez *Pink *Jessica Simpson |align="center"| |- |align="center"|2002 |Britney Spears | *Mary J.
